author: Israel Murguia
text: I am seeking a sample RFP for a transit district that is looking for pro-active solutions to its current parking needs. Seeking an RFP where a selected consultant will develop a detailed and cohesive parking study for all parking facilities serving related stations/parking facilities. Some of the elements to be included are: existing parking conditions & recommendations, future parking needs & recommendations, and recommended parking requirements.
title: Parking Management Consulting Services RFP
